overview: Highlights from the 1998-99 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. Here it is folks, the greatest hockey tape of this millennium. Blue and I have picked the best hits, goals, saves, bloopers and more. Plus, all the best highlights from the NHL last season. Everything from overtime goals, to crunches behind the net, and of course Coach's Corner. As a bonus I'm going to give you parents some advise on getting your budding NHL'ers to the next level in minor hockey. Almost one hour of non-stop action. Blue says 'you're going to love it!'
title: Don Cherry 11: The New Millenium
